mapper.select:
select id as id, commodityid as commodityid, stock as stock, price as price, sale as sale, purchase as purchase, xystock as xystock, updatetime as updatetime from warehouse
and id=#{id}
mapper.insert: insert into warehouse( commodityid, stock, price, sale, purchase, xystock, updatetime) values( #{commodityid}, #{stock}, #{price}, #{sale}, #{purchase}, #{xystock}, now())
mapper.select: SELECT commodityid,SUM(sale) AS sumsale,c.`cname` AS cname FROM warehouse w,`commodity` c WHERE w.`commodityid`=c.`id` GROUP BY commodityid ORDER BY SUM(sale) DESC
